thread.title: Thon Maker set to start at centre against the Boston Celtics today | NBA | Sporting News
thread.title_full: Thon Maker set to start at centre against the Boston Celtics today | NBA | Sporting News

author: Benyam Kidane
title: Thon Maker set to start at centre against the Boston Celtics today | NBA | Sporting News
text:
January 28, 2017 7:16pm EST January 28, 2017 7:16pm EST The Aussie gets his second start of the season. Benyam Kidane 
Published on Jan. 28, 2017 
Jan. 28, 2017 
Australian rookie Thon Maker is set to be inserted into the Milwaukee Bucks starting lineup for their game against the Boston Celtics today. 
MORE: Report - Knicks, Clippers seeking third team for Anthony deal 
Maker started for the first time last week against the Miami Heat at the small forward position, however coach Jason Kidd confirmed the 7-footer would be playing at centre today. 
In his last start against Miami, Maker scored 6 points and one rebound in 18 minutes on the floor. Coach Kidd: We're going to start Thon tonight at the 5. #OwnTheFuture pic.twitter.com/itRihVbePo â€” Milwaukee Bucks (@Bucks) January 28, 2017 
"We would like to see more [from Thon], so somebody has got to sit and we're going to start him tonight." Kidd said during his pre-game media. 
"I thought that second group yesterday did a really good job of getting us back in the game and when he's been on the floor for us, he's been positive, so we got to figure out how to get him more minutes on the floor." 
The Milwaukee Bucks take on the Boston Celtics from 12:00pm AEDT. Catch all the action on NBA League Pass.
